bibl.title: The Contribution of Graeco-Roman Elephantine to the Theology of the First Cataract Region.
bibl.note: Cult buildings of Elephantine. - Elephantine and its cosmogony. - Khnum and Osiris. - The cult of Osiris at the Khnum temple. - Osiris Nesmeti and the cult staff of Khnum. - Royal theology. - Satis-Sothis. - Elephantine and Kalabsha.

bibl.title: The First Cataract of the Nile. One Region - Diverse Perspectives

bibl.seg: Ewa Laskowska-Kusztal, The Contribution of Graeco-Roman Elephantine to the Theology of the First Cataract Region.

Dietrich Raue, Stephan J. Seidlmayer & Philipp Speiser (edd.), The First Cataract of the Nile. One Region - Diverse Perspectives = Deutsches Archäologisches Institut. Abteilung Kairo. Sonderschrift 36 (Berlin - Boston, 2013) pp. 103-109, 3 figg. et pl. 22.
